text: Jaan lo kay tum jiss qisam ki aur jo kuch ghanimat hasil kero uss mein say panchwa hissa Allah ka hai aur rasool ka aur qarabat daron ka aur yateemon ka aur miskeenon ka aur musafiron ka agar tum Allah per eman laye ho aur uss cheez per jo hum ney apney banday per uss din utara hai jo din haq-o-baatil ki judaee ka tha jiss din do fojen bhirr gaee thin. Allah her cheez per qadir hai
